name: Lauren
description: Incredibly comfortable, absorbent and gets softer after washing.

name: Christine
description: Beautiful print and the sand does not stick to it!

name: Jessica
description: Perfect size, so soft, and the design is amazing!

name: Tash
description: Great for travel! Lightweight, repels sand, and dries quickly.

name: Chaerli
description: Made with a quality you can't find anywhere else.

name: Carole
description: Almost too pretty to use in the sand but nice to know the sand will slide right off!

name: Maira
description: So practical and elegant at the same time, Iâ€™m using it everywhere for my kids.

name: Paulette
description: Great size. It really does repel the sand.

name: Pwill
description: Just the right color, style, size and pattern.

name: Ursula
description: Super absorbent, dries fast, and the colors are cheery and vivid.

name: Julia
description: This towel is AMAZING! Easily shakes off and is amazing at wiping stubborn sand off of me!

name: Cindy
description: Not only is this towel beautiful, it's functional too!

name: Tatiana
description: Dries quickly and no sand sticks to the fabric!

name: E.M.
description: The mystery bundle pricing cannot be beat! Great way to purchase for gifting.

name: Elin
description: They are beautiful, soft, elegant and in subtle colors.

name: Michelle
description: It's good for the beach but I get so much more use out of it.

name: Carrie S
description: The towel is beautiful! It is thin so it folds nicely.

name: Hannah
description: So soft, dries quickly and the sand just falls right off.

name: Debbie
description: I love how big this towel is!

name: Dawn
description: The design is even more beautiful in person, and it's so soft.

name: Dana
description: Excellent blanket. Perfect size for two adults. Sand shakes right off.

name: Michelle A.
description: Sand Cloud towels belong in an art exhibit. The designs are genius.

name: Timothy P.
description: This towel is perfect for my kayak and my truck after a trip.

name: Ryan I.
description: The beach towels completely live up to the hype! We don't pack a suitcase without bringing them along.

name: Barb
description: I love the design. Towels are so soft and dry quickly.

name: Carla
description: Lightweight, absorbent, fast-drying, wicks sand and can be used as a blanket indoors. Great quality and beautiful design!

name: Diana
description: Very soft, beautiful colors and holds up well. Great travel blanket for the beach or desert!

name: Cindy
description: A wonderful towel with the convenience of a backpack.

name: Dawn
description: Disney and Sand Cloud together? A home run!!!

name: Marion
description: Great size and has many uses beyond a beach towel.

name: Jan
description: Sand Cloud + Disney = Perfect!

name: Michelle
description: Super cute and light weight!

name: Katie
description: Love the subtle Disney print!

name: Heather
description: Absolutely love the design and the material!

name: Sarah
description: I love the size and quality! We take our new towel everywhere and it's perfect!

name: Lyndsey
description: BEST BEACH TOWEL EVER! Literally so soft and gets softer with every wash!

name: Laurie
description: This blanket accommodates so many people, dries quickly, and the sand shakes from it so easily!

description: Blanket is exactly as described - soft and light, really big, extra comfortable with a beautiful design.
